This is how it works.

1.- Download

The templates are available to purchase individually or in bundles for 1 or teams.

Read more about the license here

2.- Integrate

The templates can easily integrated with React, Vue, Nuxt, Next, laravel and more, read it on Tailwind's docs.

Read the documentation here

3.- Deploy

You can easily deploy them with Netlify, Vercel and many more.
